channel.title: 🏢 University of Massachusetts on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 University of Massachusetts on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Abstract Reward Processes: Leveraging State Abstraction for Consistent Off-Policy Evaluation
item.description: STAR framework leverages state abstraction for consistent, low-variance off-policy evaluation in reinforcement learning, outperforming existing methods.
